verses.verse: And He entered <WG1525> again <WG3825> into a synagogue; <WG4864> and a man <WG444> was there <WG1563> with a withered <WG3583> hand. <WG5495>
And they were watching <WG3906> Him [to see] if <WG1487> He would heal <WG2323> him on the Sabbath, <WG4521> in order <WG2443> that they might accuse <WG2723> Him.
And He said <WG3004> to the man <WG444> with the withered <WG3584> hand, <WG5495> "Rise <WG1453> and [come] forward <WG1519>! <WG3319>"

And He said <WG3004> to them, "Is it lawful <WG1832> on the Sabbath <WG4521> to do <WG4160> good <WG18> or <WG2228> to do <WG2554> harm, <WG2554> to save <WG4982> a life <WG5590> or <WG2228> to kill <WG615>?" But they kept <WG4623> silent. <WG4623>

And after looking <WG4017> around <WG4017> at them with anger, <WG3709> grieved <WG4818> at their hardness <WG4457> of heart, <WG2588> He said <WG3004> to the man, <WG444> "Stretch <WG1614> out your hand. <WG5495>" And he stretched <WG1614> it out, and his hand <WG5495> was restored. <WG600>

And the Pharisees <WG5330> went <WG1831> out and immediately <WG2117> [began] taking <WG1325> counsel <WG4824> with the Herodians <WG2265> against <WG2596> Him, [as to] how <WG3704> they might destroy <WG622> Him.
And Jesus <WG2424> withdrew <WG402> to the sea <WG2281> with His disciples; <WG3101> and a great <WG4183> multitude <WG4128> from Galilee <WG1056> followed; <WG190> and [also] from Judea, <WG2453>

and from Jerusalem, <WG2414> and from Idumea, <WG2401> and beyond <WG4008> the Jordan, <WG2446> and the vicinity <WG4012> of Tyre <WG5184> and Sidon, <WG4605> a great <WG4183> multitude <WG4128> heard <WG191> of all <WG3745> that He was doing <WG4160> and came <WG2064> to Him.

And He told <WG3004> His disciples <WG3101> that a boat <WG4142> should stand <WG4342> ready <WG4342> for Him because <WG1223> of the multitude, <WG3793> in order <WG2443> that they might not crowd <WG2346> Him;

for He had healed <WG2323> many, <WG4183> with the result <WG5620> that all <WG3745> those who <WG3745> had <WG2192> afflictions <WG3148> pressed <WG1968> about <WG1968> Him in order <WG2443> to touch <WG681> Him.

And whenever <WG3752> the unclean <WG169> spirits <WG4151> beheld <WG2334> Him, they would fall <WG4363> down <WG4363> before <WG4363> Him and cry <WG2896> out, saying, <WG3004> "You are the Son <WG5207> of God! <WG2316>"
And He earnestly <WG4183> warned <WG2008> them not to make <WG4160> Him known. <WG5318>
And He went <WG305> up to the mountain <WG3735> and summoned <WG4341> those whom <WG3739> He Himself <WG846> wanted, <WG2309> and they came <WG565> to Him.
And He appointed <WG4160> twelve, <WG1427> that they might be with Him, and that He might send <WG649> them out to preach, <WG2784>
and to have <WG2192> authority <WG1849> to cast <WG1544> out the demons. <WG1140>
And He appointed <WG4160> the twelve: <WG1427> Simon <WG4613> (to whom He gave <WG2007> the name <WG3686> Peter <WG4074>),

and James, <WG2385> the [son] of Zebedee, <WG2199> and John <WG2491> the brother <WG80> of James <WG2385> (to them He gave <WG2007> the name <WG3686> Boanerges, <WG993> which <WG3739> means, <WG1510> "Sons <WG5207> of Thunder <WG1027>");

and Andrew, <WG406> and Philip, <WG5376> and Bartholomew, <WG918> and Matthew, <WG3102> and Thomas, <WG2381> and James <WG2385> the [son] of Alphaeus, <WG256> and Thaddaeus, <WG2280> and Simon <WG4613> the Zealot; <WG2581>
and Judas <WG2455> Iscariot, <WG2469> who <WG3739> also <WG2532> betrayed <WG3860> Him.

And He came <WG2064> home, <WG3624> and the multitude <WG3793> gathered <WG4905> again, <WG3825> to such <WG5620> an extent <WG5620> that they could <WG1410> not even <WG3366> eat <WG2068> a meal. <WG740>
And when His own people heard <WG191> [of this,] they went <WG1831> out to take <WG2902> custody <WG2902> of Him; for they were saying, <WG3004> "He has lost <WG1839> His senses. <WG1839>"

And the scribes <WG1122> who came <WG2597> down <WG2597> from Jerusalem <WG2414> were saying, <WG3004> "He is possessed <WG2192> by Beelzebul, <WG954>" and "He casts <WG1544> out the demons <WG1140> by the ruler <WG758> of the demons. <WG1140>"
And He called <WG4341> them to Himself and began speaking <WG3004> to them in parables, <WG3850> "How <WG4459> can <WG1410> Satan <WG4567> cast <WG1544> out Satan <WG4567>?
"And if <WG1437> a kingdom <WG932> is divided <WG3307> against <WG1909> itself, <WG1438> that kingdom <WG932> cannot <WG1410> <WG3756> stand. <WG2476>
"And if <WG1437> a house <WG3614> is divided <WG3307> against <WG1909> itself, <WG1438> that house <WG3614> will not be able <WG1410> to stand. <WG2476>
"And if <WG1487> Satan <WG4567> has risen <WG450> up against <WG1909> himself <WG1438> and is divided, <WG3307> he cannot <WG1410> <WG3756> stand, <WG2476> but he is finished! <WG5056>

"But no <WG3762> one <WG3762> can <WG1410> enter <WG1525> the strong <WG2478> man <WG2478>'s house <WG3614> and plunder <WG1283> his property <WG4632> unless <WG1437> <WG3361> he first <WG4413> binds <WG1210> the strong <WG2478> man, and then <WG5119> he will plunder <WG1283> his house. <WG3614>
"Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, all <WG3956> sins <WG265> shall be forgiven <WG863> the sons <WG5207> of men, <WG444> and whatever <WG3745> <WG1437> blasphemies <WG988> they utter; <WG987>

but whoever <WG3739> <WG302> blasphemes <WG987> against <WG1519> the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> never <WG3756> <WG1519> <WG165> has <WG2192> forgiveness, <WG859> but is guilty <WG1777> of an eternal <WG166> sin <WG265> " â€“
because <WG3754> they were saying, <WG3004> "He has <WG2192> an unclean <WG169> spirit. <WG4151>"
And His mother <WG3384> and His brothers <WG80> arrived, <WG2064> and standing <WG4739> outside <WG1854> they sent <WG649> [word] to Him, and called <WG2564> Him.

And a multitude <WG3793> was sitting <WG2521> around <WG4012> Him, and they said <WG3004> to Him, "Behold, <WG2400> Your mother <WG3384> and Your brothers <WG80> are outside <WG1854> looking <WG2212> for You."
And answering <WG611> them, He said, <WG3004> "Who <WG5101> are My mother <WG3384> and My brothers <WG80>?"
And looking <WG4017> about <WG4017> on those <WG3588> who were sitting <WG2521> around <WG4012> <WG2945> Him, He said, <WG3004> "Behold, <WG2396> My mother <WG3384> and My brothers! <WG80>
"For whoever <WG3739> <WG302> does <WG4160> the will <WG2307> of God, <WG2316> he is My brother <WG80> and sister <WG79> and mother <WG3384>."
